name: Sandbox homecod
description:
You can make your own house,world,castle or anything ,use your creative mind 

feature :

 -Colored Block(click the block to change it color)

-furniture(couch,lamp,door,table,pot

-nature block(flower,cactus,grass,tree,bush,fish,crab,water,dirt

-wasd control

The red ball is the marker ,move it with WASD button then click the block you please to place with cursor

many feature and new block coming soon
